entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [mono][interp] Enum.CompareTo returns incorrect result when enum has bool underlying type #88170
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] GC hole in libraries test with JitStress=2 #88168
    8.0.0
  • July 2023 Infra Rollout: Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #88164
    8.0.0
  • Consider matching ETW to fire the new events added to EventPipe #88162
    8.0.0
  • Running ProcessStartInfo as different UserName and Password doesn't work on Linux #88161
  • R2R Test CpuId_R2R_Avx fails locally #88156
  • OptionsValidator source-gen causes VS analyzer to crash #88152
  • OptionsValidator source-gen shouldn't cover static and const members #88150
  • [wasm] perf pipeline clang crashes on PERFTIGER200 #88148
  • [browser][MT] public API of threading, like new Thread vs PNSE #88147
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json #88143
  • [browser][blazor] Unexpected files in publish folder #88142
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Example usages of a VectorSVE API #88140
  • [API Proposal]: Change accessibility of System.Random's implementation #88138
  • Vector128.ConditionalSelect don't emit vpblendvb on x64 #88129
  • NativeAOT fails to catch rethrown exception in edge cases #88128
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] improve testing InvariantTimezone #88127
    Future
  • Deadlock when configuring ApplicationInsightsServiceOptions #88124
  • debugger-agent not able to evaluate / resolve type with provided expression (mono) #88123
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute replaces verbatim string with regular string #88122
  • Please add the pattern to the summary of GeneratedRegex partial method #88121
  • Require the functionality of dynamic base classes #88120
  • Compile corehost.sln Error NETSDK1013 TargetFramework value "" is not recognized #88116

Closed

  • ReadOnlySpan<char> has its char values replaced (or dereferenced) by terminating char "\0" after constructing string for a 2nd time #88158
  • API proposal: Utf8.IsValid(bytes) #502
    8.0.0
  • .NET runtime (on Linux) crashes with SIGABRT when using OpenSSL 3 with deprecated APIs disabled #79153
  • Symbols are not correctly indexed for 6.0.16 Sytem.Collections.dll #87334
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support Asynchronous Signing in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SignatureGenerator #83476
  • Add ProcessInfo3 diagnostic IPC command to include libc type or equivalent #74476
    8.0.0
  • Prefer Dictionary<K, V>.TryAddValue(key) over guarded Add(key) #33799
    8.0.0
  • Change stress test runs to use "createdump" #8551
    Future
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort receive 0x1A lead to exception #85567
    Future
  • Newly added intellisense msbuild conditions cause overbuild #82191
  • VTable setup of type WasmLibrary.TestClass failed #88054
  • Service Provider cannot resolve transient service from the Root scope if the `ValidateOnBuild` option is enabled #87429
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Improve some reflection types - add not-null DeclaringType properties #86987
  • Service Collection does not allow Type Generic Classes with fewer open Generic Types to be used, even if all Types missing Open Generic Types are provided as Compile Constants #87746
  • InMemoryDirectoryInfo does not work with "/" as a root #88135
  • [API Proposal]: Flag to disable TLS Resume/Session Caching in SslStream #78305
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128 API's on Amd64 with mini JIT #86272
    8.0.0
  • Infinite generic recursion over fields not detected #79587
    8.0.0
  • Build -vs generates corehost.sln an error is reported #88115
  • Support for RVA static fields with a class constructor on field owning type #68278
    Future
  • Increase tags count in TagList for no allocation from 8 to a higher value #83701
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2211409 #88169
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [CI test] SearchValues<string> #88166
    NO-REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Use Utf8.IsValid in System.Text.Json #88165
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add clr.tools subset to runtime-community #88160
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: fix case where RBO leads to an invalid CSE #88159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress System.Drawing.Common dependency from System.Windows.Extensions #88157
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Clone AllowTlsResume as part of SslClientAuthenticationOptionsExtensions.ShallowClone #88155
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Dedup Task.WhenAll non-generic and generic implementations #88154
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/7.0-staging] Revert Deflater/Inflater changes around SafeHandle initialization #88153
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • Tweak the register order for xarch to better account for callee saved #88151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono] Use InlineArrayAttribute for ArgumentData and StackAllocatedByRefs #88149
    area-System.Reflection
  • Support displaying AttributeValue in binary form #88144
    area-System.Security
  • Delete some dead code #88139
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88137
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Possible fix for 84564 #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ProfileEnter / ProfileLeave #88134
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in regular promotion #88130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NamedPipeServerStream.Unix: GetImpersonationUserName tweaks. #88125
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • TarEntry: small fix-up. #88118
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Use wasm if opcode for null checks and conditional branches #88114
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • [iOS] Skip PfxIterationCountTests.Import_BlobHasMoreThanOnePfx_LoadsOnlyOne #88146
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Set SelfContained to true for iOS/Android sample apps #88126
    area-Build-mono
  • Added Utf8.IsValid(bytes) #88004
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • fix runtime build failures on ppc64le #88145
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • Fix validation on build #87354
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove unused pParentOffset argument in few ExceptionTracker methods #88131
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] introduce sourcemaps #86152
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Remove stack trace metadata decoder if stack trace data disabled #88117
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Remove Vector<T> fallbacks #88101
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Fix handling recursion over fields #88083
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Workaround for __clear_cache() #88039
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enable physical promotion by default #88090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IHostedLifecycleService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, 8.0.0
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion from 6.2.2 to 6.2.4 #88107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Relaxing IsConnected Check for Datagram Sockets #87916
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Discard lastIndexMarshalled variable if it is not otherwise used #88060
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug changes #87979
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    blocked, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT rethrow bug #88113
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection debugging #88082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #88071
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add AddHttpClientDefaults #87953
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [IGNORE] [mono] Add support for SSE1 in JIT mode. #88075
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't hook into LLVM error reporting in the Jit #2323
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Introduce a shadow stack allocation phase #2322

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to june 23 #2318

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch fails when directory has multiple csproj files #33674
  • RazorCoreCompile omits AnalyzerConfigFiles #33672

Closed

  • Duplicate error code found #33133
  • Add support for podman credentials by using Valleysoft.DockerCredsProvider 2.2.0 #33034
  • error C S0117: 'Ascii' does not contain a definition for 'EqualsIgnoreCase' #33645
  • error CS1739: The best overload for 'ToFrozenDictionary' does not have a parameter named 'optimizeForReading' #33646

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [iOS] Add HybridGlobalization flag in dotnet/sdk #33669
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [Blazor] Fixes for the unified project experience within Blazor projects/apps #33649
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Updating the runtime to 7.0.8 #33670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33635
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers release notes #33537
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: add read support for oci manifest v1 #33655
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: split `Registry.cs` and made it testable #33536
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2211453 #33590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add explicit System.Text.Json dependency #33618
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-format analyzers on disabled diagnostic doesn't return immediately #68829
  • Collection literals: implement IOperation #68826
  • 'Create and assign [field|property]' does not work for primary constructor parameters #68817
  • Error List does not present the correct URI for the displayed diagnostic ID from a Roslyn analyzer's helpLinkUri #68816
  • Snippets inserted in Visual Studio 2022 mess up tabbing #68815
    17.8 P1
  • Documents from different projects with the same path are considered the same since 4.6.0 #68814
  • Text font in DocumentOutline can't be changed #68809

Closed

  • The `language` property of the SARIF file should be output correctly #68745
    17.7
  • Incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzer #68654
  • [API Proposal]: New command line option for reporting IVT info #68666
  • Relax restriction on InlineArray of refs #68819
  • Features packages have not been published for 4.5 #67166
  • Implementing IOptionMonad<T, Self> from the dotNext project in a type in another project is impossible #68767
    17.7
  • Bad performance from CoreWF - no fast way to create a LambdaExpression from VB script code #68712

PullRequests

Created

  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #68827
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [LSP pull diagnostics] Handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68818
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind to EnvironmentFontFamily in DocumentOutLineWindow. #68811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Do not emit empty language property in SARIF log #68801
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzers #68655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #68812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid deadlock what attempting to reopen files #68825
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2211254 #68824
  • Collection literals: use NoneOperation #68795
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, OnDeckForServicing
  • Update config for snap #68822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md for InlineArrays #68823
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Allow declaring ref fields as elements of inline arrays. #68820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, 17.7 P3
  • Rename background analysis option name #68810
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, 17.7 P3
  • Include expected custom modifiers for `in` parameters of virtual operators. #68808
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7 P3
  • "Fix" LSP semantic token modifiers #68744
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.7 P3
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7 P3

Updated

  • Make SimplifierOptions public #67012
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Doc how to test in VSCode #68733
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Collection literals: address comments #68793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove IRoutingStateProvider or bring it back #49084
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor unified project design #49079
    8.0-preview7
  • `dotnet new --update-apply` thinks 1.0.0-beta9 is newer than 1.0.0-beta10 and above #49077
  • [Blazor] Blazor single project experience follow ups #49074
    8.0-preview7
  • Minimal API with authorization policy throws 'Unable to find the required 'IAuthenticationService' service' when policy fails #49073
  • Blazor Server initiated request as CORS set-up not function as expected #49072
  • `dotnet run` won't work by default for the new Blazor Web template #49071
  • When using StateHasChanged, the value is not reflected in the InputText #49069
  • Consider providing override for platform detection in JS/TS SignalR client #49065
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.8 introduces error #49064
    8.0-preview7

Closed

  • Css Isolation Configuration #49081
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #49011
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #49060
  • [Blazor]StateHasChanged does not reflect immediately #49048
  • ASP0019 should not fire if code guards with ContainsKey() #46907
    8.0-preview3
  • Support indexer use in InputBase #41618
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor validation on form posts #46983
    8.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #49000

PullRequests

Created

  • Use correct casing for WebAssembly in template text #49085
    area-blazor
  • Remove IRoutingStateProvider from Router #49083
    area-blazor
  • Fix invalid catch block in StringUtilities #49082
    area-runtime
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • Add public metadata types. #49068
    area-runtime
  • Ignore pings on sendsCloseMessageOnStop #49067
    area-signalr
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix condition for including the service worker assets in the project #49076
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Disable sendsCloseMessageOnStop() Java SignalR test #49044
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android crash when adding a View to a Layout that is already in another Layout #15920
  • Maui ios app crash due to no default color set when using bindings for gradients #15919
  • [WinUI] CarouselView / CollectionView : Control events never fire #15914
  • A button placed under another view cannot be tapped/clicked on iOS and MacCatalyst #15913
  • [MacOSX][Label] Label won't display text in italic #15912
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #15910
  • Grid Columns Affecting Row Resize Behaviour (WinUI/MacCatalyst) #15909
  • [MacOSX][Entry] - Invisible cursor #15908
  • XamlC error XFC0000 : Cannot resolve type "Application". #15904
  • `CarouselView` on `Windows` doesn't update `SelectedItem` #15900
  • When I Capture a photo the second time the camera does not open - IOS #15899
  • RefreshView+CollectionView is broken in a Modal presentation with style PageSheet on iOS #15898
  • iOS: UseSafeArea is ignored when root-element is a ScrollView #15897
  • Disable MenuFlyoutItem #15896

Closed

  • [Regression] - Grid Columns Not Resizing Correctly (WinUI/MacCatalyst) #15905
  • [regression/7.0.81] 7.0.81 Service Release 4 breaks CascadeInputTransparency #14522
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Shell Title Changes Randomly (iOS/macOS) after navigation #6582
    Backlog
  • Error running an iOS Native View #6757
    Backlog
  • Font Alias is not working #13805
  • Android .MAUI Hello World Projects crashed after Time Zone change and crossing country borders in Release Mode #15786
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ViewExtensions Enhancements #15901

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr7] [net7.0] "Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size (#14902) (#15653)" #15917
  • [net7.0] "Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size (#14902) (#15653)" #15915
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.4 to 7.3.5 #15911
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • [X] x:Type and x:Static don't expand to Extension #15903
    area/Xaml </>
  • Reflect default value of IsClippedToBounds property #15894
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Revert] Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItems… #15886
    area/collectionview 📃

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add convention types for service properties #31155
  • EntityFramework Migration Generation Produces Unexpected Index Column Name #31153
  • Migration boilerplate causes "Nullable directive is redundant" if nullable types are disabled #31152

PullRequests

Created

  • Use IDbSetCache.GetSets() when checking for resettable services #31154

Updated

  • Json reader final maybe #31150
